mapper.select: select atdc_hstr_ordr , atdc_hstr_emp_no , to_char(atdc_hstr_dat, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as atdc_hstr_dat , atdc_hstr_writ_type , to_char(atdc_hstr_stim, 'hh24:mi:ss') as atdc_hstr_stim , to_char(atdc_hstr_etim, 'hh24:mi:ss') as atdc_hstr_etim , atdc_hstr_type , floor(mod((atdc_hstr_etim - atdc_hstr_stim),1)*24) as workTimeHour , floor(mod(mod((atdc_hstr_etim - atdc_hstr_stim),1)*24,1)*60) as workTimeMinute , to_char(NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-7, '일요일'), 'yyyy-MM-DD') as weekStartDate , to_char(NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-1, '토요일'), 'yyyy-MM-DD') as weekEndDate from atdc_hstr where atdc_hstr_emp_no = #{emp_no} and to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= atdc_hstr_dat and atdc_hstr_dat between NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-7, '일요일') and NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '토요일') order by atdc_hstr_dat desc
select CI.cmp_info_wokt from cmp_info CI inner join emp_info EI on(EI.emp_info_cmp_code = CI.cmp_info_code) where emp_info_emp_no = #{emp_no}

select floor(mod(sum(atdc_hstr_etim - atdc_hstr_stim),1)*24) as weekSumWorktimeHour , floor(mod(mod(sum(atdc_hstr_etim - atdc_hstr_stim),1)*24,1)*60) as weekSumWorktimeMinute from atdc_hstr where atdc_hstr_emp_no = #{emp_no} and to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= atdc_hstr_dat and atdc_hstr_dat between NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-7, '일요일') and NEXT_DAY(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')-1, '토요일')

select to_char(NEXT_DAY(trunc(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'DD')-7, '일요일'), 'yyyy-MM-DD') as weekStartDate , to_char(NEXT_DAY(trunc(to_date(#{date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'DD')-1, '토요일'), 'yyyy-MM-DD') as weekEndDate , 0 as "weekSumWorktimeHour" , 0 as "weekSumWorktimeMinute" , 0 as "weekOverWorktimeHour" , 0 as "weekOverWorktimeMinute" , 0 as "weekRemainWorktimeHour" , 0 as "weekRemainWorktimeMinute" from dual
mapper.insert: insert into atdc_hstr ( atdc_hstr_ordr , atdc_hstr_emp_no , atdc_hstr_dat , atdc_hstr_writ_type , atdc_hstr_stim , atdc_hstr_etim , atdc_hstr_type ) values ( atho_seq.nextval , #{emp_no} , to_date(#{today}, 'yyyy/MM/dd') , '본인' , to_date(#{sTime}, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mi:ss') , null , '내근' )
mapper.update: update atdc_hstr set atdc_hstr_etim = to_date(#{eTime}, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mi:ss') where atdc_hstr_emp_no = #{emp_no} and atdc_hstr_stim = to_date(#{sTime}, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mi:ss')
